_header: Alas it is I that wot not what to say
Note:
Followed by 2116; Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 100.
_description: The rejected lover — one stanza rhyme royal

BLAdd5465.First Lines: Alas it is I that wote nott what to say…
BLAdd5465.Note: With music in three voices credited to Turges.
